issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: When setting up simpleHAFederatedTopology in MiniDFSCluster, each Namenode should have its own configuration object, and the configuration should have "dfs.namenode.http-address-<nameservice>-<namenodeid>" set up correctly for all <nameserivce, namenodeid> pair
fields.summary: Separating Configuration object for namenode(s) in MiniDFSCluster

comments.body: I think the patch makes sense. One minor comment: can you add {{@return}} javadoc to the {{configureNameNodes}} method as its name is not straightforward to the newly added returning behavior.
Thanks for the review, I have updated the javadoc in patch v2

This message was automatically generated.

Thanks [~l201514] for identifying the issue. Having each namenode use its own Configuration should work.

* Why is the removal of {{if (!federation && lastDefaultFileSystem != null)}}? That is still needed for non federated case? It might explain the test failure.
* Some code can be shared in the two steps a) set up the nameservice related configs for each newly created NN. b) copy all NNs's nameservice related configs to the all NNs. In both case, it needs something like {{private static void copyKeys(Configuration srcConf, Configuration destConf, String nameserviceId, String nnId)}}, where it copies RPC/HTTP/HTTPS addresses for the specific nameservice/nnid from some conf to another conf.
[~mingma], it seems that patch v6 doesn't have a test report. Is there a way to start a test?

[~l201514], there are some debug statements like "System.out.println" in the latest patch. Can you update the patch? After that, we can track if it is submitted to https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/.
ok. I have removed "System.out.println" in patch v7
